notes: Police in Zinjibar, Abyan, have reported that unidentified gunmen attacked and then burned a CARE vehicle. No injuries were reported, and it is not clear whether CARE staff were present at the time of the attack.

actor 2: Military Forces of Yemen (2016-) Supreme Political Council
notes: Anti-Houthi soldiers reportedly took control of a number of areas in the "Al-Kubar" location in the Fadhahah front after clashing with Al-Houthi soldiers in the area. According to the source, clashes resulted in the "death and injury" of an unspecified number of Houthi fighters and two military vehicles were destroyed by airstrikes during the battle. Pro-Hadi sources later reported 30 Houthi fatalities as a result of the clashes.
sources: 26 September Website (Pro-Hadi); NewsYemen; Aden Al-Ghad; http://adengad.net/news/352174/

actor 2: AQAP: Al Qaeda in the Arabian Peninsula
notes: Islamic State militants claim to have killed a member of Al-Qaeda using an IED in the Humaydah area of Wald Rabi district, Al-Bayda governorate.

notes: A civilian was killed and 5 others injured during a Houthi shelling attack on the city of Hays.

notes: Anti-Houthi fighters reportedly shot down a Houthi drone in Qaniyah area, Ma'rib.

actor 2: Military Forces of Yemen (2016-) Supreme Political Council
notes: Saudi-led coalition sources claim that a warplane destroyed a Houthi ballistic misile launcher in Sadah. No specific location was given, and no info on casualties.
Anti-Houthi forces targeted an ice cream shop in Kilu 16 area of Hudayda with artillery fire, wounding one worker inside.

actor 1: Military Forces of Yemen (2016-) Supreme Political Council
notes: 1 civilian was killed and 6 others wounded during a Houthi shelling attack in downtown Hudayda.
Three civilians were killed and 7 others injured by shelling allegedly fired by anti-Houthi forces into the Dar-Al-Salam hospital area of Hawak district, Hudayda.

An alleged drone strike carried out by Saudi-led coalition forces hit a civilian house in the 24th neighborhood in Mina, Hudayda, killing 2 civilians and wounding 4 others (including 2 women and a child). Anti-Houthi sources reported that the house was hit by Houthi shelling.
A child (male) was killed by a bullet allegedly fired by the anti-Houthi troops in Suwaiq area of Tuhayat district, Hudayda.

actor 1: Military Forces of Yemen (2016-) Supreme Political Council
notes: Houthi shelling reportedly injured ten people, including three women on al-Karaemah village, southeast al-Jah, west Bait al-Faqih district, west Yemen on Friday.

actor 1: Military Forces of Yemen (2016-) Supreme Political Council
notes: A child was injured by a mortar shell fired by Houthi forces into the Al-Ghayl village, Jawf.

actor 1: Military Forces of Yemen (2016-) Supreme Political Council
notes: Houthi soldiers stormed the house of Mujahid al-Qahali, the former minister of expatriate affairs in Sana'a. According to the source, he was beaten by the soldiers who also threatened to blow up the house.
A young civilian man was shot dead by unidentified gunment in the city of Tarim, Eastern Hadhramawt for unknown reasons

According to a coalition source, the missile struck Houthi reinforcements on a military vehicle while on thier way to al-Yasbal Mounts in al-Baidha province, killing and injuring fighters aboard. Unknown fatalities coded as 10.

Saudi-soldiers from across the border fired artillery shells into the border districts of Baqim, Dhahir, Razih, and Monabbih. No injuries or fatalities were reported. ** A number of livestock were kiled in Monabbih district by the shelling.
